headline: Brother of boy in iconic Syrian photo dies of injuries
content: By Kareem Khadder and Ralph Ellis, CNNUpdated 1849 GMT (0249 HKT) August 23, 2016 Amman, Jordan (CNN)The brother of the Syrian boy whose impassive, bloodied and dust-covered image struck a nerve across the globe died of injuries from the airstrike this week on his family's house in Aleppo.CNN's Mia Alberti contributed to this report.
